# Pricing Sheet

## Product/Service Name
- [ ] Enter the name of the product or service.

## Pricing Model
- [ ] Describe the pricing model (e.g., subscription, one-time fee).

## Price
- [ ] Specify the price.

## Payment Terms
- [ ] Outline the payment terms.

## Discounts
- [ ] List any available discounts.

## Add-ons
- [ ] Describe any optional add-ons and their pricing.
